Components

Application

class sophys_gui.components.application.SophysApplication(argv)[source]

Bases: QApplication

Application that enables generic utilities for the widgets.

Features enabled:

  • Error Window

  • Popup

  • Styling

Create a hidden popup widget.

Catch thrown exceptions.

Get error code from the exception message.

Generate a generic style for the GUI application.

showBugError(exctype, excvalue, tracebackobj)[source]

Show a new window for unknown errors.

showExpectedError(message)[source]

Show a popup for user known errors.

Verify known error dictionary.

Console

class sophys_gui.components.console.SophysConsoleMonitor(model)[source]

Bases: QScrollArea

Widget for displaying the Queue Server console logs.

Note

The console will scroll to the bottom after an update in order to show the most recent log.

getConsoleLabel()[source]

Create the label widget.

scrollToBottom()[source]

Scroll the scroll area to the bottom. Used in order to show the latest logs.

serverMonitor()[source]

Monitor and send new labels for the label widget.

updateConsoleLabel(output)[source]

Concatenate the last log to a variable and update the label widget.
